metadata.title: Privacy Policy | Glow - GDPR & CCPA Compliant Loyalty Platform
metadata.description: Learn how Glow protects your data. GDPR and CCPA compliant privacy policy for our minimalist loyalty platform designed for artisans.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to Glow ("we," "our," or "us"). We provide a lightweight membership and loyalty platform designed specifically for artisans and makers. We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting the personal data of both our Merchants (artisans) and their Members (customers).

collection.title: 2. Information We Collect
collection.intro: We only collect the minimum amount of data necessary to provide our services:

merchants.title: For Merchants
merchants.content: Name, email address, brand assets (logos/colors), and payment information (processed securely via Creem).

members.title: For Members
members.content: Email address and/or phone number (provided voluntarily when joining a loyalty card), and transaction/points history.

technical.title: Technical Data
technical.content: IP address, browser type, and usage data collected automatically via Vercel for security and performance monitoring.

usage.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
usage.intro: We use the collected data to:
usage.point1: Generate and manage digital artisan membership cards.
usage.point2: Facilitate communication (Email via Resend, SMS via Twilio) between Merchants and Members.
usage.point3: Process subscriptions and payments through Creem.
usage.point4: Improve platform stability and user experience.

infrastructure.title: Infrastructure
infrastructure.content: Your data is stored using Neon (PostgreSQL), a secure, cloud-native database.

protection.title: Security
protection.content: We implement industry-standard encryption to protect data at rest and in transit. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

retention.title: Retention
retention.content: We retain personal data only as long as an account is active or as needed to provide services.

thirdParty.title: 5. Third-Party Services
thirdParty.intro: To provide a seamless experience, we integrate with the following trusted partners:

creem.name: Creem
creem.purpose: Payment Processing (we do not store credit card details).

thirdParty.communication: These partners may process your data in accordance with their own privacy policies. We ensure all third-party services meet industry-standard security and privacy requirements.

rights.title: 6. Your Rights (GDPR & CCPA)
rights.intro: Depending on your location, you have the following rights:

access.title: Access & Portability
access.content: Request a copy of the data we hold about you.

correction.title: Correction & Deletion
correction.content: Request that we update or erase your personal information.

optout.title: Opt-Out
optout.content: Members can unsubscribe from marketing communications at any time using the "Unsubscribe" link in emails or replying "STOP" to SMS.

cookies.title: 7. Cookies
cookies.content: We use essential cookies to maintain your session and remember your preferences. We do not use intrusive tracking or third-party advertising cookies.

changes.title: 8. Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any significant changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date.

contact.title: 9. Contact Us
contact.intro: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:
